MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G34 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Lochbridge Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:46am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a fault on our underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:50pm on the 10th of March 2021.
